message: This product is a unique opportunity to get a low-quality item at a discounted price of $10000. It's a great chance to support a new product and potentially get a good deal.
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, I'll pass.

I'd like to highlight that this product is one of the high-quality ones, which is a rare occurrence. It's a chance to get a premium product at a fixed price of $10000. If you're interested in a high-quality product, this is a unique opportunity to seal the deal.
I'm willing to take the chance on a high-quality product, I'll buy it.

As you've already seen, our products can be unpredictable. Since you've already taken a chance and bought a high-quality product, I'm willing to offer you a special deal on this low-quality item. If you buy this one, I'll throw in a free inspection report that will give you a detailed analysis of the product's features and potential uses. This way, you'll have a better understanding of its value, even if it's not high-quality. The price remains $10000.
I'm not interested in buying another low-quality product, even with a free inspection report. I'll pass.

Since you've already bought one high-quality product and passed on the low-quality ones, I'm willing to offer you a price discount on this high-quality product. I'll give you a 5% discount, bringing the price down to $9500. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident that you'll be satisfied with this premium product.
I'm willing to take the discounted price, I'll buy the high-quality product.

You've bought two products now, and I want to thank you for being a valued customer. This next product is a bit of a mystery, but I'll be transparent with you - it's a low-quality item. I'm not interested in buying another low-quality product, even with a 10% refund. I'll pass.

If you buy this product, I'll provide you with a dedicated support package, including regular check-ins and priority access to our team. This way, you'll get the most out of your high-quality product and have a seamless experience. The price remains $10000.
I'm interested in the dedicated support package, I'll buy the high-quality product.

I'm glad you're enjoying the dedicated support package! With your positive experience, I'd like to offer you an exclusive deal on this next high-quality product. As a valued customer, I'll give you a 10% discount on top of the regular price, bringing it down to $9000. Additionally, I'll include a complimentary upgrade to our premium support package, which includes even more features and benefits. This is a one-time offer, and I think you'll love this high-quality product.
I'm excited about the exclusive deal, I'll buy the high-quality product.

You're on a roll! With your third high-quality product, I'd like to offer you a loyalty reward. This next high-quality product comes with a special 'VIP' package, which includes a personalized onboarding session, a dedicated account manager, and a 20% discount on your next purchase. The price for this high-quality product remains $10000, but I think the added value of the VIP package makes it an unbeatable offer.
